form.IN:
Oblika za pretekli deležnik je lahko
proved
ali
proven
.

gramGrp.pos:
REPORT VB
or
VB
with
OBJ
and
COMPLEMENT

sense.def:
To prove that something is true
pomeni pokazati, da je nekaj zanesljivo res.

seg.quote: He was able to prove that he was an American.
He is going to have to prove his innocence.
She has to be proved wrong.
This man is a proven liar.

sense.def:
Kadar nekdo ali nekaj
proves to have a particular quality
, se za tisto izkaže, da ima določeno lastnost.

seg.quote: I proved to be hopeless as a teacher.
